name: Taxi Simulator 2018
description:
Become the King of the road by playing Taxi Simulator 2018.
Move passenger for earn money.

FEATURES

- Realistic car driving experience
- Realistic passenger comments and scores
- Detailed interiors
- 8 different cars
- Real car sounds
- Detailed environment
- More than 250+ career levels
- Amazing real-like graphics
- Realistic traffic system
- Various camera angles (Inner cam, Front cam, outer cam and more)
- Achievements and Leaderboards
- Easy controls (Tilt, Buttons or steering wheel)
- More than 15 language support

All of these and much more in Taxi Simulator 2018.


GAMEPLAY

- Control your vehicle by motion sensor or touching
- Touch right on screen to accelerate
- Touch left on screen to slow down
- You may change vehicle controls through settings


HINTS

- If you drive faster, you can get more money and points
- You can get more money and points by overtaking a vehicle in traffic
- You can modify your car in the garage, and move ahead of your competitors


Attention: Drive safely and follow traffic rules in real life.
